entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries or rain showers beginning this evening then changing to a few rain showers near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
